Key Match Events: Coby White made a go-ahead layup with 47 seconds left
Zach LaVine had 35 points, 10 rebounds and eight assists
Nikola Vucevic had 24 points and 11 boards
White then drove into the lane and dunked over a late-arriving Wembanyama
Post-Match Reflections: The Chicago Bulls rallied in the fourth quarter to top the San Antonio Spurs 114-110
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the United Center with a crowd of 18,886
Chicago used an 11-0 run to trim San Antonioâ€™s lead to 79-71 with 5:24 left in the third quarter
Others: Wembanyama had 23 points, 14 rebounds and eight blocks for San Antonio
Chicago won for the fourth time in five games
